text:
Antoine Roundtree (born March 27, 1975), better known as Skee-Lo, is an American rap music singer. He is best known for his 1995 rap song "I Wish". In the United Kingdom, he had another hit song, "Top of the Stairs". The latter came from the "Money Train" soundtrack.
His first hit song on radio was "I Wish" during the summer of 1995. The song didn't have profanity or violence. This was when gangsta rap was incredibly popular.
Skee-Lo was born in Chicago, Illinois. He later moved to New York City, then to Los Angeles.
